page.title: 08CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content:
Childrens Games.
In the play ground of Axminster Secondary School pupils play a varity of games. During the summer Cricket is popular while in the winter football is played. Other games played include TAG and IT. In both of these games the child who is it has to chase the others until he catches them and thus making the one caught it. Apart from formal games the play ground is used to discuss the previous nights television programs or the latest pop video or single. On wet days pupils use class rooms for reading talking or watching videos and some times for playing with micro computers.
